name: Trial of Ascent - Infinite Climber
description:
The Trial of Ascent: Inhabitants of the island of Takan undergo a trial to test their strength and stamina by climbing an erupting volcano, often leading to death, this trial is likely the most dangerous past-time on the planet. Players be warned.

------

This infinite climber has one goal, survive for as long as you can as you climb an infinite wall, while dodging lethal rocks. Good luck!

Blue flowers recharge your stamina

Orange flowers recharge your health

-----

Controls

This game is a port of a mobile game, it uses mouse input only, and can be played with one hand on either touchpads and mouse.

Climb: Click and flick your cursor up, left, right, or down.

Shimmy a ledge: Click and drag either left or right to shimmy a ledge.

------

Known bugs

There is a rare instance where you may grab the side of a ledge, this is actively being investigated.
